contentList.content: You tap into the power of the Elemental Planes through your practice of martial arts
Warrior of the Elements
You are a master of unarmed combat. You learn techniques to push and trip your opponents and manipulate your own energy to protect yourself from harm.
Warrior of the Hand
You practice stealth and subterfuge, channeling your reservoir of power to harness the power of the Shadowfell.
Warrior of Shadow
Dodge

You focus entirely on avoiding attacks. <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>, and you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>
Flurry of Blows: First Strike
Flurry of Blows: Second Strike
Flurry of Blows: Decoupled
Step of the Wind

You move with the speed of the wind. You can take the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash_StepOfTheWind">Dash</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash_Disengage_StepOfTheWind">Dash and Disengage</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="Action">actions</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.
Step of the Wind: Dash and Disengage

Double your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Disengage">disengage</LSTag>. Jump no longer requires a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.
Dodge

<LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>, and you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Patient Defense

You focus entirely on avoiding attacks. You can take the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Disengage_PatientDefense">Disengage</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Disengage_Dodge_PatientDefense">Disengage and Dodge</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="Action">actions</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.
Patient Defense: Disengage
<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Disengage">Disengage</LSTag>
Patient Defense: Disengage and Dodge

<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Disengage">Disengage</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>, and you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>
Uncanny Metabolism
Once per long rest, at the start of combat you can regain all expended <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Points</LSTag> and heal for [1]
Deflect Attacks

Use your reaction to reduce the damage from a weapon attack by 1d10 + your Dexterity Modifier + your monk level.

If the damage is reduced to 0, you can use a Ki Point to Deflect the Attack.
Use your reflexes to deflect a weapon attack back at your attacker.
You can use your reaction to deflect weapon attacks. When you do so, the damage is reduced by [1] + your Monk class level.
Use your reaction to reduce the damage from a weapon attack by 1d10 + your Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> + your monk level.
Toggle Deflect Attacks
Corrosive Strikes
Your fists become extensions of elemental earth. Your unarmed attacks instead deal acid damage.
Freezing Strikes
Your fists become extensions of elemental water. Your unarmed attacks instead deal cold damage.
Searing Strikes
Your fists become extensions of elemental fire. Your unarmed attacks instead deal fire damage.
Jolting Strikes
Your fists become extensions of elemental air. Your unarmed attacks instead deal lightning damage.
Elemental Attunement
You attune yourself to the elemental forces of the multiverse. You gain the ability to strike with the power of the elements and move enemies to and fro on a whim.
Concussive Strikes
When you use your unarmed strikes, enemies are pushed [1] away from you
Vacuum Strikes
When you use your unarmed strikes, enemies are pulled [1] towards you
Reposition your dark shroud. It Heavily Obscures and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinds</LSTag> creatures within. Creatures cannot make ranged attacks into or out of it.
Shadowvision
You gain <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Darkvision">Darkvision</LSTag>. If you already have Darkvision, gain <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="SuperiorDarkvision">Superior Darkvision</LSTag>
Use your ki to possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stun</LSTag> the target. On a save, instead deal [1] as your ki slams against the enemy's defenses.
Stunning Strike
Affected entity knows how to break its fall. It is <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to Falling damage.
As a Bonus Action, you can heal yourself. You regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.
Hand Monk Heal Charge(s)
Point used to heal as a bonus action.
Heightened Discipline

Your training has pushed your body and mind to new levels. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Target_FlurryOfBlows">Flurry Of Blows</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Shout_Dash_Disengage_StepOfTheWind">Step Of The Wind</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="Shout_Disengage_Dodge_PatientDefense">Patient Defense</LSTag> spells are upgraded.
Punch three times in quick succession.
Punch three times in quick succession and possibly knock the target <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Punch three times in quick succession and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="OPEN_HAND_NO_REACTIONS">Stagger</LSTag> the target, making it unable to take reactions.
Punch three times in quick succession and possibly push the target [1] away.
Self-Restoration

You use your strength of will to overcome <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag> statuses
Heightened Defense
Heightened Step
Self-Restoration Charge
Stride of the Elements

When you use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash_StepOfTheWind">Step of the Wind</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash_Disengage_StepOfTheWind">Step of the Wind: Dash and Disengage</LSTag>, you gain <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="FLY">Flying</LSTag> for 20 turns
Improved Shadow Step
Your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_UnarmedStrike_Monk">Unarmed Strike</LSTag> is free.

You no longer require darkness to step across the battlefield. Afterwards, you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your next melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> and your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_UnarmedStrike_Monk">Unarmed Strike</LSTag> is free.
Fleet Step

When you use your bonus action for anything other than <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash_StepOfTheWind">Step of the Wind</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash_Disengage_StepOfTheWind">Step of the Wind: Dash and Disengage</LSTag>, you can cast either spell for free.

Your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash_StepOfTheWind">Step of the Wind</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash_Disengage_StepOfTheWind">Step of the Wind: Dash and Disengage</LSTag> is free.
